item.title: Erroneous 'Phoenix Centre' arrow sign on lamp column fronting 396, Croydon Rd, Beckenham pointing up Faversham Rd., 2nd October
item.description:
Erroneous 'Phoenix Centre' arrow sign on lamp column fronting 396, Croydon Rd, Beckenham pointing up Faversham Rd. An online search reveals only a children's Phoenix Centre at 40, Masons Hill, Bromley (Google Streetview image as the third image). Brckenham Hospital was redeveloped as the Beckenham Beacon Medical Centre around the year 2000. Perhaps this sign relates to that? Please remove the sign if it is indeed, as it appears, utterly pointless, and relocate it to Masons Hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 379-397, Croydon Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dear local aerial manager and local authorities. Simon Priscilla, Denise Corbin, antisocial behaviour department, local councillors, local mayor of Hackney, the commissioner of the metropolitan police, could you please all put your brains together and come up with a solution to stop this anti-social behavior and criminal activity taking place on the Trowbridge estate which is on the rise. Drug users junkies shiting outside leaseholders garage door 13,12 white male around 21:00pm.local authority could you please address this issue of anti-social behaviour. Drug users junkies,crackheads loitering and waiting in between Osborne Road garages and brickworth way to pick up drugs on 15/03/25 at 21:00pm. Junkies trying to break into leaseholders rented garages. local junkie was nosing around near leaseholders garage doors trying to open door. Possibly looking for somewhere to sleep for the night. Local residents feel unsafe and insecure with junkies, drug users on the increase in the area on the Trowbridge estate. Residence of getting scared to come out of a night because there is a constant flow of all different drug users loitering. Also urinating and shiting. There are families that live on this estate this is terrible behavior for residents to witness even small children. Local authorities have a duty to protect members of the public and residents.These issues need addressing ASAP.Also there is a property at 25 Trowbridge Rd, London E9 5LD which is attracting this anti-social behavior and criminal activity local criminals using the property as a drug den.The mayor of Hackney, police commissioner, management Simon Priscilla,Denise Corbin, local councillors would not like it if this was happening outside their home address would they., 2nd October
item.description:
What does Hackney Council actually do about antisocial behavior. Absolute nothing.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Reading Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: To whom it concerns. Could you please address these issues previously happened but not addressed antisocial behaviour criminal activity.A Residence of the Trowbridge estate Graham Hawkins has been breaking into Osborne road void garages since 2016 & 2023 rent free. Graham Hawkins breaking into void garages with a battery pack handle grinder.Residence, Leaseholders were disturbed by what Graham Hawkins was doing Which this behaviour should not be tolerated by hackney council & Randall Kerry garage team hand posted a warning letter to the address of Graham Hawkins 10 Dainty way E9 5JJ.Resident from 21 Mallard close E9 5JL Eugene Egan has been involved with the trespassing,assisting,helping Graham Hawkins move his stuff out of garage.when mr Graham Hawkins was breaking into the garage Eugene Egan was also aware of what Graham Hawkins was doing.Breaking and entering trespassing. Also on the night when Graham Hawkins was breaking into the garage 16,19,with a battery pack handle grinder. Eugene Egan approach mr Graham Hawkins and reply to Graham Hawkins the subcontractor purdys cut the lock and done that to you Graham and took your stuff out of garage 19 and put it into garage 16 and changed lock.Graham Hawkins was cutting the padlock off garage 16 with a battery handle grinder as Eugene Egan was there with Graham Hawkins On 01/08/23 at 20:00pm.Eugene Egan knows this information because he has a CCTV overlooking all of the leaseholders garages monitoring their daily routines and feeding information to Graham Hawkins. criminal behaviour was taken place. Eugene Egan has been tipping resident Graham Hawkins off about the void garages because it's a coincident how chair member knows which garages are empty,void and which ones are leased out seen as Eugene Egan works with the council official people he would know that sort of information.Hackney council put notice up on garage door to vacate garage 19,16 trespassing Graham Hawkins remove his stuff out of garage 16 and placed it into two garages which Eugene Egan has access and keys owns, leases from Hackney council which was 23 & 24 Osborne road garages subletting criminal activity, possibly garage tenancy fraud in different names.Eugene Egan help,assisting,perpetrator,trespasser resident Graham Hawkins remove his stuff into Eugene egan garages at 23 & 24 because the resident got caught and found out by the local hackney council garage team.Eugene Egan and Graham Hawkins should not be in that garage without the hackney councils authorization,criminal activity, trespassing.Shows the connections with one another how Trowbridge resident association chair member looks out for Graham Hawkins.criminal behaviour.Tra corruption. This was reported to the metropolitan police. Residence and other Leaseholders pay their rent so why should this one or two residents get away with breaking into garages rent free for a number of years this is discrimination and antisocial behavior. If somebody could please address this behavior and investigate., 2nd October
item.description:
Income services manager Ian Clark please could you look into this a legal activity you target people for rent areas with garage but you do not target residence break in to void garages five years rent free. Hackney Council discriminate law dividing citizen

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Reading Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple trees/bushes blocking pavement, 2nd October
item.description:
As per report ref: 8101487 which I raised early September which was then marked as fixed even though the problem had not been resolved. Multiple trees/bushes are blocking the pavement between 7a Victoria Road and the junction with Park Crescent. The overgrowth has been a regular occurence for years, they do not get pruned regularly enough. The blockage forces pedestrians to walk on the grass verge, which has caused the verge to turn to mud due to the footfall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
